sentences.en: all the hurts and wrongs of the past
sentences.cn: 过去所受的所有伤害和委屈

sentences.en: Blacks have been hurt by racial inequalities in housing and education.
sentences.cn: 住房与教育方面的种族不平等现象让黑人深受伤害。

sentences.en: English has hurt me a thousand times, but I still regard it as my first love.
sentences.cn: 英语伤我千百遍，我待英语如初恋。

sentences.en: Foreign competition has hurt the company’s position in the market.
sentences.cn: 来自国外的竞争已经对这家公司的市场地位造成损害。

sentences.en: Forty-one people are said to have been seriously hurt.
sentences.cn: 据说41人身负重伤。

sentences.en: His collar bone only hurt when he lifted his arm.
sentences.cn: 他的锁骨只有在抬臂时才感觉到痛。

sentences.en: I didn't mean to hurt her, only to keep her still.
sentences.cn: 我不是故意要弄痛她，只是想让她别乱动。

sentences.en: I didn’t mean to hurt your feelings.
sentences.cn: 我不是故意要伤害你的感情。

sentences.en: It hurt so badly he wished to cease to be.
sentences.cn: 他觉得疼痛难忍，恨不得死了算了。

sentences.en: It hurts when I try to move my leg.
sentences.cn: 我的腿一动就痛。

sentences.en: My back hurts.
sentences.cn: 我背痛。

sentences.en: Put that thing down - you might hurt someone with it.
sentences.cn: 快把那东西放下，你会伤着别人的。

sentences.en: She rubbed her arms, but they hurt and she desisted.
sentences.cn: 她揉了揉胳膊，感觉很疼就停下了。

sentences.en: She saw the hurt in his eyes.
sentences.cn: 她看到了他眼中的伤痛。

sentences.en: She spoke haltingly of her deep upset and hurt.
sentences.cn: 她吞吞吐吐地诉说自己深深的苦恼及伤痛。

sentences.en: She took off her shoes, doubtless because her feet hurt.
sentences.cn: 她脱掉了鞋子，大概是因为脚疼。

sentences.en: The aggression of a bully leaves people feeling hurt, angry and impotent.
sentences.cn: 暴徒的侵犯令人们感到痛心、愤怒却又无能为力。

sentences.en: The only thing I consider wrong is when you hurt someone.
sentences.cn: 我认为唯一的过错就是伤害别人。

sentences.en: The turning point in the process of growing up is when you discover the core of strength within you that survives all hurt.
sentences.cn: 当你从内心深处找到一种可以忍受一切痛苦的坚强力量时，你的成长历程就会出现飞跃。

sentences.en: They have both behaved very badly and I am very hurt.
sentences.cn: 他们俩都很不友善，让我非常难过。

sentences.en: Was anyone hurt in the accident?
sentences.cn: 事故中有人受伤吗？

sentences.en: We expressed in the clearest possible way our disappointment, hurt and anger.
sentences.cn: 我们清楚明白地表达了我们的失望、伤心和愤怒。

sentences.en: Where does it hurt?
sentences.cn: 哪儿痛？

sentences.en: Yasin had seriously hurt himself while trying to escape from the police.
sentences.cn: 亚辛试图从警察手中逃脱时受了重伤。

words.tran_cn: 感到疼痛；有坏处；带来痛苦

trans.tran_en: a feeling of great unhappiness because someone, especially someone you trust, has treated you badly or unfairly
to injure yourself or someone else

trans.tran_cn: 使…受伤，感到疼痛，弄伤，使伤心，危害，处于困境
trans.tran_en: to injure yourself or someone else
to feel pain in part of your body

trans.tran_cn: 使受伤，弄痛；伤…的感情；危害；损害
trans.tran_en: to injure yourself or someone else
